entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
